website_summaries.verdict: A sturdy, full-trailering stability kit that includes a wheel chock and a variety of straps, although you may find this difficult to use with a narrow trailer.
pros: Includes wheel chock, front tire strap, rear ratchet tie-downs, and mounting plate
For use with all sizes of motorcycles
Easy to install and mount/dismount a bike
cons: Minimal instructions on how to use
Strap ratchets are not the best quality
Some found this hard to use with a narrow trailer

customer_reviews.title: Really a quality product easy to install but the rear ratchet straps have no ...
customer_reviews.text: Really a quality product easy to install but the rear ratchet straps have no usable instructions. Not only does it not have assemble instructions it also doesn't have any advice on placement location for the d hooks, as in pull forward or rearward etc. It took me a long time to realize that I don't need to use the d ring to attach the ratchet strap that came with my order. Geez this would have been helpful, you guys built a great product then dropped the ball by omitting the instructions for your ratchet straps.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Bratton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Easy to install, and use. I researched various motorcycle transport products before choosing Lock n Load. It appeared to be the best product for the job and it came at a reasonable price break. I transported my Harley Road King 1800 miles and the bike never moved at all during the entire trip. It literally takes only a couple of minutes to lock down the bike for transport and unlock when your ready to ride. When you consider the cost of a high end touring motorcycle these days you want to insure that they are safely secured during transport. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Verne

customer_reviews.title: When loading a Harley dresser...
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about this wheel-chock, the straps really good design. However, as a single person coming to pull it out? It wasn’t easy for 940# Harley dresser. I had to negotiate with the rear strap to pull it back a little then jump on seat and complete the exit clean. I hope I made it clear.
customer_reviews.author: Elio

customer_reviews.title: Hauled cross country
customer_reviews.text: This worked very well for me. I installed it in a Ryder box truck filled 60% full with my life belongings and the latter 40% filled with this and my Yamaha FZ6 (600CC mostly naked street bike). I drove it from Georgia to Los Angeles with zero problems. Checked it once a day. Not too hard to install but you certainly have to drill a few holes for the parts to mount
customer_reviews.author: Slugger

customer_reviews.title: Works Very Well!
customer_reviews.text: Makes loading my Harley a breeze! I still attach to straps from the handle bars just to give additional support side to side. But I do not suck my forks down very much. Just a little. I can't quite trust just the tire strap. But I did not use the rear end straps because there is no convenient place on my bike to use them. But I do like the chock setup very much.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Defective, Dissatisfied, Overpriced!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this September 29th, 2019 and used it for the first time yesterday ( 02/19/2020 ) I’m completely dissatisfied! It’s nothing like the installation video. It took around three hours to install and one of the rear ratchets plastic cover broke immediately. Both of the rear ratchets don't retract as they should and I stopped twice during transit to check them and lock them down. I hope customer support reads this so I can return them or have them replaced. Don’t waste your money on this overpriced system.
customer_reviews.author: Scp

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but damaged upon arrival.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I bought a new enclosed trailer and had to install everything including the D rings so I bought the full kit and a extra set of D rings and straps. However, once I got to the end after installing everything I realized product had some damage. The wheel chock was scratched and has over-spray of black powder coating on it. The quick disconnect lock nuts for the wheel chock are also damaged and scratched up as if they were used. Everything still works, but I am just a little disappointed I realized the damage after I spent over an hour installing everything. It wasn't worth detaching everything to return.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Barta

customer_reviews.title: It is a good idea to make sure that they are working when ...
customer_reviews.text: Mounted in our enclosed trailer, it is well built and works as described. My only issue is that the self ratcheting straps occasionally do not ratchet. It is a good idea to make sure that they are working when loading the bike.
customer_reviews.author: Tom L.

customer_reviews.title: Simple simple simple
customer_reviews.text: Mounted in my enclosed trailer, easy assembly.... my trailer doubles as my garage for my bike, get home, drop the door, pull in, thunk it’s in the cradle , lock sides, done. Product is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with the ease of loading and unloading and the ...
customer_reviews.text: WE just drove 5600 miles with our BIgDog Chopper and my 03 Dyna Low Rider, didn't have a single problem with these Lock 'N Loads keeping our babies safe and soundly in place. Very pleased with the ease of loading and unloading and the security of the products. GREAT PRODUCT!
customer_reviews.author: Riki J. Parks

customer_reviews.title: Not for large bikes
customer_reviews.text: Overall the setup is good except that I have a larger bike (Kawasaki Voyager) and the front fork holder is not large enough to support the front wheel and properly hold up the bike as I expected it to do. Not apply with how it holds the bike and the reason I bought the set-up was I expected it to fit. I’m sure the system is good for smaller bikes.. not sure what my next steps are other than tie the bike down for long trips the way I’ve always done. The video is a bit misleading.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's made very sturdy and I trust it will my 2008 Harley Ultra ...
customer_reviews.text: This wheel chock is top of the line. It's made very sturdy and I trust it will my 2008 Harley Ultra Classic. We recently hauled 4 motorcycles in an enclosed trailer and used lock 'n loads with them all. They rode well. I would highly recommend you spend the extra money and invest in this product. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: cghop

customer_reviews.title: Straps not sufficient
customer_reviews.text: Had ordered two sets. First box we received, the straps were missing out of the box. Second box was fine. Strapped two Harleys into our enclosed trailer. Husband had a hard time working with the straps for tie down. First stop on trip he checked on the motorcycles and one had tipped over onto the other one. The straps had failed. We had to purchase new straps enroute to our destination.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for our HD full dresser. One man operation. Easy to use. Good quality. As with many items, the directions are a bit "casual."
customer_reviews.author: ERIC O.

customer_reviews.title: For priceless peace of mind...
customer_reviews.text: After reading reviews, I purchased this system to replace an old chock and many-rachet-tie-down previous system. We traveled from North Louisiana to Carthage, Missouri, to pick up a Ridley motorcycle in late April. I am one who gets really nervous about trailering a bike, but all my fears were put to ease. The bike never budged, despite the horrid roads of Louisiana. Easy to install and super easy now to load up my bike. I will be purchasing another set for a second bike very soon. This system is all that it promises to be...plus the addition of peace of mind, which is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: HurricaneSara

customer_reviews.title: broken upon delivery
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if they will work at this point. We ordered these to be installed in our brand new trailer and they arrived cracked. Since we were on a deadline, we had to install them, so hopefully they'll still function as they're supposed to once we are able to get our bikes loaded and down the road. Not knocking Lock N Load,, I'm giving the 3 star for Amazon delivery service.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for our Motorcycles ( Harleys ) the Instructions where very poor. We tied the bikes down just in case and good thing we did as the belt on the front tire of one of the bikes fell off. The tie down straps that are suppose to self adjust do not, half the time they lock up and it's hard to get them to work very poor hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Jenkin

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. One of my side straps doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. One of my side straps doesn't appear to be ratcheting as it should. Need to spend more time to figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Awesome setup, I've been using for over a year ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome setup, I've been using for over a year now. I can easily load and secure my HD Switchback on my own. I use this inside an enclosed trailer, and have traveled thousands of miles without any issues. Once it's loaded up I have no concern about it falling over. I highly recommend this setup.
customer_reviews.author: IAJeeper

customer_reviews.title: Makes loading big bikes a dream!
customer_reviews.text: I would buy again in a heart beat. Makes loading and unloading our big bikes a dream!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie King

customer_reviews.title: Wheel chock works good. Rear straps don't seem to tighten down o ...
customer_reviews.text: Wheel chock works good. Rear straps don't seem to tighten down o we bumps. Actually lost both rear straps from bike. Thankfully I checked them often and wound up adding more straps.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Courtemanche

customer_reviews.title: Bought for trailer
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these to install in our trailer for two motorcycles. They were easy to install and easy to load bikes onto. I highly recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Load by yourself
customer_reviews.text: Love the lock and loads. Easy to load bikes by myself. Keeps the bikes very secure with no movement in trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie B.

customer_reviews.title: Happy
customer_reviews.text: Installation was easy, works as advertised. Feel quite confident my Ultra Classic Harley will stay in place on a trip. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Samual L. Downey

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. They had to replace the rear tie downs as they were defective but did so with priority next day shipping at no charge.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Palmer

customer_reviews.title: works good
customer_reviews.text: worked very nice just got to watch so the front tie down does not hit your rotors so it will not cut strap
customer_reviews.author: Richard Krape

customer_reviews.title: Not Indian Friendly
customer_reviews.text: Does not work "as is" for Indian Roadmaster due to wide and low front fender. It will work with a few Mods.
customer_reviews.author: Kent

customer_reviews.title: Quality not present
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 3. All 3 had issues with tie downs. Also bolts missing from 1. They sent wrong replacement parts. You pay for quality but this didn’t work well. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: Check mounting area before ordering
customer_reviews.text: Great product, but we couldn’t mount it in our toy hauler where we need to due to placement Of the holding tanks so we had to return it. :(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product and would purchase it again.
customer_reviews.text: I would purchase this Lock 'N Load package again. I have moved my motorcycle approximately 5000 miles using this system and my bike has remained secure over a variety of both rough and smooth roads.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A.

customer_reviews.title: steady and secure bike tire down
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the bike steady and secure. I have a big bike and this works great with it. Drive in latch it down and no worries
customer_reviews.author: jamie gardner

customer_reviews.title: Ratchets do not work.
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great, except for the ratchets, they don’t get tight or lock in, they’re skipping the teeth, so they don’t tighten up whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: Jon S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation and efficient!
customer_reviews.text: The installation was quite easy according to the instructions. First time loading took about 2 minutes. Couldn't be more pleased. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald C

customer_reviews.title: Install was easy and now loading my 800 pound cruiser takes about ...
customer_reviews.text: Install was easy and now loading my 800 pound cruiser takes about a minute. I should have purchased this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Edward B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest set up I have ever used
customer_reviews.author: da finn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, have not installed yet but am excited to get it on my trailer.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: best out there
customer_reviews.text: this is the best wheel chock out there wouldn't have any other
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Sweatman

customer_reviews.title: not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: tie downs poor quality. chock is sturdy and good quality
customer_reviews.author: DALE

customer_reviews.title: Have not had the opportunity to use these items as ...
customer_reviews.text: Have not had the opportunity to use these items as yet. However believe they will work perfectly for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: ease of use
customer_reviews.text: excellent product easy to install good quality and very quiuck to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent chock/ great straps! Really locks down my triumphs 16” fat tires!
customer_reviews.author: MaximusMeridius

customer_reviews.title: DON’T DO IT
customer_reviews.text: Dislike, its a piece of crap if you have a 21” wheel it will not hold your bike up. I can’t use it
customer_reviews.author: 5 STAR

customer_reviews.title: Help!
customer_reviews.text: Would this work? It does not fit inside the cradle but fits the actual chock.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The ratchet tie down buckles for the front tires can jam sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: K. C. Buckles

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant system - easy to install & works exactly as ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant system - easy to install & works exactly as demonstrated. Also great delivery time to Australia as well. Carton it came in only just held together though!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not work stock with 21" wheels.
customer_reviews.text: Size of wheels that will work really isn't specified. The system does not work with 21" wheels. I am going to modify it and see how it does. If it works after mods, I will post pictures and directions, heck I may even start selling modified units on Amazon! :)
customer_reviews.author: Nate Marshalltown

customer_reviews.title: This thing is easy to install and it is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This thing is easy to install and it is easy to use. Keeps my bike secure and you can literally set it and forget it. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: Great system easy to set up easy to use just ...
customer_reviews.text: Great system easy to set up easy to use just what I needed to load the bike by myself
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Hamler

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend purchasing this product
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommend purchasing this product. I've dealt with a lot of wheel chick systems over the years and this has everything beat!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. It was very easy to install. Took less than an hour. I am using it for my VTX1800R. I was concerned about balance and affecting the towing characteristics of my enclosed trailer. I mounted it so the load is over the axle aand the trailer tracks nicely.
customer_reviews.author: jhwii

customer_reviews.title: will not work on Honda Goldwing 2009 gl1800 hold downs ...
customer_reviews.text: will not work on Honda Goldwing 2009 gl1800 hold downs have no were to attact to with out fabrication I asked seller to return due to medical and traveling issues behind my control his reply out of return date wtf
customer_reviews.author: david bee

customer_reviews.title: Worth every dollar.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent system. Not worried at all trailering my bike. Love the one person loading with no worries..
customer_reviews.author: Lil miss Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you have a stock size tire
customer_reviews.text: It has worked for me, I only wish the Cradle was a little wider. My tires are not stock on my HD Ultra, so the tire doesn't sit into the cradle fully.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great system quick and easy . Installation was a breeze everything you need is in this package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Lock N Load BK1000 Deluxe Motorcycle Wheel Chock with Quick-Release Ratchet & D-Ring System (Orange/Black)
product_meta.description: The BK1000 Deluxe Wheel Chock Combo Kit is the most trusted and secure trailering system for all sizes of motorcycles from cruisers to dirtbikes. Security and stability start with the steel wheel chock that automatically closes the front wheel securely in place. Apply the front tie-down for the ultimate stable ride for your bike. Then double up your stability by using the rear tire ratcheting tie-downs to lock the rear tire into place. By using this Combo Kit, you can ensure your bike will remain secure through potholes, gravel roads, and speed bumps.
feature_bullets: Includes (1)BK100 Deluxe Wheel Chock, (2) BK202 Retractable Ratchet Straps, (2) Quick-Release D-Rings, (2) Quick-Release Strap Clips, (1) Mounting Plate, and (1) Front-Tire Ratchet Strap
For complete transport security, this combo kit ensures front and rear stability through use of wheel chock, front tire strap, and rear tie downs
Ride Motorcycle into Wheel Chock to Secure in Place, Motorcycle will then Stand Alone while Attaching the included Front & Rear Straps

specifications.Cover Included: Front Tire Ratchet Strap, Quick-Release D-Rings, Retractable Ratchet Straps, Quick-Release Strap Clips, Wheel Chock
specifications.Special Features: All Components use Quick-Release Anchoring for Complete Removal in Seconds
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars142 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
